properties.name: multipleMethods
properties.description: Whether to allow the webhook to listen for multiple HTTP methods

properties.name: httpMethod
properties.description: The HTTP methods to listen to

properties.name: path
properties.description: The path to listen to, dynamic values could be specified by using ':', e.g. 'your-path/:dynamic-value'. If dynamic values are set 'webhookId' would be prepended to path.

properties.displayName: Insert a 'Respond to Webhook' node to control when and how you respond. More details
properties.name: webhookNotice

properties.displayName: Insert a node that supports streaming (e.g. 'AI Agent') and enable streaming to stream directly to the response while the workflow is executed. More details
properties.name: webhookStreamingNotice

properties.displayName: If you are sending back a response, add a "Content-Type" response header with the appropriate value to avoid unexpected behavior
properties.name: contentTypeNotice
httpMethod
properties.description: The HTTP method to listen to

properties.name: responseMode
properties.description: When and how to respond to the webhook

properties.name: responseMode
properties.description: Returns data in real time from streaming enabled nodes

options.name: Streaming
options.description: Returns data in real time from streaming enabled nodes

properties.name: responseCode
properties.description: The HTTP Response code to return

properties.name: responseData
properties.description: Returns all the entries of the last node. Always returns an array.

options.name: All Entries
options.description: Returns all the entries of the last node. Always returns an array.

options.name: First Entry JSON
options.description: Returns the JSON data of the first entry of the last node. Always returns a JSON object.

options.name: First Entry Binary
options.description: Returns the binary data of the first entry of the last node. Always returns a binary file.

properties.name: responseBinaryPropertyName
properties.description: Name of the binary property to return

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether the webhook will receive binary data
properties.hint: The name of the output binary field to put the file in

options.name: binaryData
options.description: Whether the webhook will receive binary data

options.name: binaryPropertyName
options.description: If the data gets received via "Form-Data Multipart" it will be the prefix and a number starting with 0 will be attached to it
options.hint: The name of the output binary field to put the file in

options.name: binaryPropertyName
options.description: The name of the output field to put any binary file data in. Only relevant if binary data is received.

options.name: ignoreBots
options.description: Whether to ignore requests from bots like link previewers and web crawlers

options.name: ipWhitelist
options.description: Comma-separated list of allowed IP addresses. Leave empty to allow all IPs.

options.name: noResponseBody
options.description: Whether to send any body in the response

options.name: rawBody
options.description: Whether to return the raw body

options.name: responseContentType
options.description: Set a custom content-type to return if another one as the "application/json" should be returned

options.name: responseHeaders
options.description: Add headers to the webhook response

options.name: responsePropertyName
options.description: Name of the property to return the data of instead of the whole JSON
